Class StringUtil

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.gogui.util.StringUtil

public final class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Static utility functions related to strings.

capitalize

public static java.lang.String capitalize(java.lang.String message)
Capitalize the first word and trim whitespaces.

formatTime

public static java.lang.String formatTime(long seconds)
Format elapsed time as [[h+]:[mm]]:ss.

getDate

public static java.lang.String getDate()
Return the current time and date as a string using a long format. The time and date is formatted using DateFormat.LONG and Locale.ENGLISH.

getDateShort

public static java.lang.String getDateShort()
Return the current time and date as a string using a short format. The time and date is formatted using DateFormat.SHORT and Locale.ENGLISH.

getDefaultEncoding

public static java.lang.String getDefaultEncoding()
Get default encoding.

getErrorMessage

public static java.lang.String getErrorMessage(java.lang.Throwable e)
Return a printable error message for an exception. Returns the error message is for instances of ErrorMessage or for other exceptions the class name with the exception message appended, if not empty.

getNumberFormat

public static java.text.NumberFormat getNumberFormat(int maximumFractionDigits)
Return a number formatter with maximum fraction digits, no grouping, locale ENGLISH.

isEmpty

public static boolean isEmpty(java.lang.String s)
Check if string is null, empty, or contains only whitespaces.

printException

public static java.lang.String printException(java.lang.Throwable exception)
Print exception to standard error. Prints the class name and message to standard error. For exceptions of type Error or RuntimeException, a stack trace is printed in addition.

Returns:
A slightly differently formatted error message for display in an error dialog.

split

public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String s,
                                       char separator)
Split string into tokens.

splitArguments

public static java.lang.String[] splitArguments(java.lang.String string)
Split command line into arguments. Allows " for words containing whitespaces.

trimTrailing

public static java.lang.String trimTrailing(java.lang.String s)
Trim trailing whitespaces.
